squared.game

Class NormalModeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • squared.game.NormalModeController

  • public class NormalModeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls all actions that can happen when NormalMode.fxml is loaded. Contain methods that add handlers to squares in game.
    Author:
    bartl_000
